experience: You and Vicky both know Jim Skidmore, Luma Dahlbacka, and 22 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
Vicky worked at Charles Schwab before you started

•	Led implementation of the vendor based Translation Management System solution at Charles Schwab from project inception, business case analysis, vendor qualification to system implementation. Introduced system based translation memory and glossary to Schwab localization process.•	Designed and launched Schwab in-house translation request process and workflow to automate translation request communication, tracking and reporting  •	Steered different phases of Schwab localization strategies, achieving corporate goals including cost savings, resource utilization and integrated experience across business units•	Aligned International and localization web development process into Schwab.com product development and release cycle to bridge the process gap and promote efficiency   •	Coordinated with Legal and Compliance Department to define localized and translated content review guidelines and approval process•	Partnered with Schwab.com Design Team to incorporate multicultural and international elements into brand standards & web design guidelines •	Developed web product strategies for Schwab International and Chinese clients•	Defined Schwab.com Chinese user experience and conducted usability studies for the localized products•	Managed and delivered Chinese translated monthly Schwab market commentary and experts’ insight articles •	Conducted competitor analysis and industry research for Schwab international and multicultural product strategy.•	Manage multiple translation & localization vendors and monitored translation quality and services delivery•	Facilitate resolutions of localization issues and defect of Schwab.com projects in Agile development methodology

•	Assessed and certified Schwab.com Chinese Financial News translation with high linguistic standards. Effectively reviewed hundreds of translated financial news daily to ensure news content quality and accuracy. •	Managed Schwab Chinese Prospect Site content migration project to transfer the web content to Schwab proprietary Content Management System with the redesigned content structure and new website architecture•	Established Schwab Traditional Chinese translation style guide, linguistic standards and glossary •	Managed Schwab in-house Chinese Translation Team•	Reviewed and signed off Schwab Chinese translated web content, collaterals and client communication documents•	Oversaw Schwab Chinese Prospect Site content release process and website updates

•	Monitored market data and trading activities with the Exchange proprietary surveillance system to prevent manipulative or illegal trading practices in the OTC securities market. •	Supported the Exchange Compliance department and SEC Regulatory authority to propose market rules and regulations amendment •	Created bilingual OTC stocks investment & trading educational materials to promote the orderly securities market and increase market awareness•	Acted as key liaison to support the Exchange Public Relation for OTC business expansion among the foreign institutional investors.

•	Supported client activities include portfolio assessment, data analysis and investment research  •	Managed of the monthly publication of President Research Journal from content sourcing, translation, layout design to publishing •	Facilitated sales events include listed company visiting, investor forums and seminars  •	Assisted floor trading & order execution

recommendations: I was very lucky to have Vicky in my team.  Vicky is very versatile, muti-talented, resourceful and action oriented.  She knows how resolve complex project issues and has a good mix of business, brokerage, sales, project, product, web publishing, localization and people management experience.  Her extensive knowledge in brokerage and trading ares has helped our business unit implemented & launched many successful projects.  She is very dependable, mature and easy to work with.  A great people manager, communicator and team player.  I really enjoyed working with Vicky and would love to work with her again in the future!

summary: More than 15 years of experience including product localization, content translation, strategic planning and project management with strong background in financial products and website management. FINRA Series 7, 63 and 24 licensed. Areas of expertise include:•	Strategic planning for Financial Services website localization•	End to end product localization lifecycle management •	Localization and translation vendor management•	Content, translation and linguistic standards development and maintenance•	Chinese copywriting and copy editing•	Best practice and process management•	Program/Project management•	Risk management•	Strong problem resolution skills
